rows.label: bf10230100_0010
rows.name: This world was once the stage...

rows.label: bf10230100_0020
rows.name:
of a struggle for survival that
dwarfed this current predicament.

rows.label: bf10230100_0030
rows.name: The world was ugly, but it was also beautiful.

rows.label: bf10230100_0040
rows.name: What do people live for?

rows.label: bf10230100_0050
rows.name: Who do they live for...?

rows.label: bf10230100_0060
rows.name: [ML:undisp]...

rows.label: bf10230100_0070
rows.name: They live for themselves.

rows.label: bf10230100_0080
rows.name:
To harbor desires and struggle to realize
them - that is the natural state of man.

rows.label: bf10230100_0090
rows.name: But I did not think that was good enough.

rows.label: bf10230100_0100
rows.name: I despaired for mankind.

rows.label: bf10230100_0110
rows.name: I searched tirelessly for an outside solution.

rows.label: bf10230100_0120
rows.name: And one day, I found it. The Conduit.

rows.label: bf10230100_0130
rows.name: Why it chose to appear before us, I do not know.

rows.label: bf10230100_0140
rows.name: However, its existence presented a new possibility...

rows.label: bf10230100_0150
rows.name: Possibility?

rows.label: bf10230100_0160
rows.name: Our world was not the only one.

rows.label: bf10230100_0170
rows.name: Endless universes coexist, side by side,

rows.label: bf10230100_0180
rows.name: yet all completely unaware of one another.

rows.label: bf10230100_0190
rows.name:
The Conduit was our link to
these foreign worlds...

rows.label: bf10230100_0200
rows.name: And I opened that forbidden gateway...

rows.label: bf10230100_0210
rows.name: praying that it would change the world...
